item.title: Expedition Diaries: A Project to Learn
item.description: A few years ago, I started Expedition Diaries, a personal project to explore old travelogues while learning full-stack development. This post reflects on the journey, the challenges faced, and the lessons learned in backend, frontend, and infrastructure.
